description:
Ryo auditions at a theater so he can be close to his neighbor and client, a professional dancer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinjuku Success Monogatari, Otonari-san wa Bijin Dancer (Zenpen)
Shinjuku success legend. The neighbor is a beautiful dancer (Part 1)
新宿サクセス物語 お隣さんは美人ダンサー (前編)
